title: Indri Releases Playbooks: Fast, Easy Retail and Ecommerce Digital Marketing Campaigns That Work
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 7:00 AM   Indri 
DOVER, N.H. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Today, Indri launched Playbooks for Retail and Ecommerce. These digital marketing campaigns allow advertisers to make simple choices about how they want to market their products and services, and the Indri software platform sets up the campaigns, launches them, and provides actionable reports on results. 
“With Playbooks, Indri is putting tools into marketers’ hands that allow fast, easy setup of campaigns that are proven to work,” said Alec Newcomb, CEO of Indri. “We’ve proven them by working with leading brands selling products in the world’s largest retailers like Walmart, Target, and CVS.” 
Running retail and ecommerce digital campaigns can be complex and time-consuming. With Indri Playbooks, a marketer chooses the type of campaign they want to run, and within 48 hours is driving qualified traffic to their targets. 
Data driven Playbooks automatically coordinate digital media campaigns for repeatable success across 32,000+ stores and multiple ecommerce platforms. The power of synced campaigns and smart reporting drives Indri Playbooks’ consistent results. 
Playbooks include: Pay Per Click - drive website and retail store traffic with Google AdWords, Bing, Facebook, and Amazon Geotargeting by Retailer - drive traffic to retail via geotargeting users in and around stores Weather by Retailer - optimize bids automatically based on geolocation and weather conditions Mobile - drive traffic to retail stores by geotargeting mobile users in and around stores Remarketing - drive traffic to retail stores by remarketing to previous visitors to a website Holidays by Retailer - holiday-specific campaigns for Thanksgiving, Christmas, and other major holidays Landing Pages - drive traffic to retail store-specific landing pages that show the nearest retail store carrying products Store Inventory by Retailer - turn campaigns on or off based on local store inventory levels Google Analytics - set up tracking to ensure traffic and metrics are reporting to Google Analytics 
Playbooks are available at http://indri.co/playbooks/ 
About Indri: Indri is a software platform that easily scales your retail & ecommerce sales. Data driven Playbooks automatically coordinate your digital media campaigns for repeatable success across 32,000+ stores and multiple ecommerce platforms. It’s smart, simple to use, mobile ready, and backed by experts that spend all day thinking about moving that SKU off the shelf, 52 weeks of the year.
